sql.name: Department.insert
sql.content: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT(ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

sql.name: Department.update
sql.content: UPDATE DEPARTMENT SET NAME = ?, DESCRIPTION = ? WHERE ID = ?

sql.name: Department.select
sql.content: SELECT ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = ?

sql.name: Employee.insert
sql.content: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE(ID, NAME, DEPARTMENTID, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

sql.name: Employee.departmentisnull
sql.content: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET DEPARTMENTID = NULL WHERE DEPARTMENTID = ?

sql.name: Employee.test
sql.content: select Employee.id, Employee.name, Department.id as "department.id" , Department.name as "department.name" from Employee inner join Department on Employee.departmentId=Department.id where Employee.id=?
